name: CHICKUZI
description:
PLAY AS CHICKUZI. A DUAL WIELDING, UZI LOVING, REVENGE DRIVEN CHICKEN THAT UNBEKNOWNST TO MANY IS THE REAL HERO OF EASTER. RAMPAGE THROUGH DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS AND ATTEMPT TO TAKE REVENGE ON THESE BUNNIES FOR STEALING YOUR FAMILY'S EGGS.

DESTRUCTION

UTILIZE AN ARRAY OF POWERFUL WEAPONS TO DESTROY CARROT CITY AND EVERYTHING IN IT. VOXEL DESTRUCTION ALLOWS FOR COMPLETE DECIMATION OF THE ENVIRONMENT.

BULLETS CAN TAKE OUT THE CITY PIECE BY PIECE. CHAINSAWS CARVE AWAY AT GREAT SPEEDS. BUT SOME WELL PLACED ROCKETS CAN FLATTEN A BUILDING.

OBJECTIVES

THERE ARE 9 OBJECTIVES TO COMPLETE AROUND CARROT CITY. WITH A MIX OF FIND, COLLECT, DESTROY, AND ELIMINATION TASKS. COMPLETE ALL THE OBJECTS AND RACK UP THE HIGHEST SCORE POSSIBLE! DON'T FORGET, GETTING TAKEN DOWN WILL REDUCE YOUR SCORE BY 10% SO WATCH YOUR BACK!!!

GAMETYPES

THERE IS ONE PRIMARY GAMETYPE THAT REVOLVES AROUND COMPLETING THE OBJECTIVES AND PICKING UP A HIGHSCORE. HOWEVER, WHAT IS FUN WITH ONE PERSON, CAN BE EVEN MORE FUN WITH FRIENDS!

SINGLE-PLAYER (1 LEVEL, 9 OBJECTIVES)

MULTI-PLAYER (IP CONNECTIVITY, HOST SERVER, HIGHSCORE CHALLENGE)

NOTE: Multiplayer is not officially included in this version of chickuzi. We have included the ability to play with friends so that we can gain valued feedback from the community on the kind of gameplay they would like from such a feature.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

PLEASE FILL OUT OUR FEEDBACK FORM SO THAT WE CAN MAKE CHICKUZI THE BEST GAME IT CAN BE.

FEEDBACK FORM: http://goo.gl/forms/IePWQbv1sL


ALSO DROP A LIKE ON CHICKUZI'S FACEBOOK OR TWITTER TO HELP SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT!!!

FACEBOOK: Facebook.com/Chickuzi

TWITTER: @chickuzi

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0ketD1tlKIoZkE5xYxeZjA


WEBSITE IS CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION. CHECK BACK SOON!

WEBSITE: Chickuzi.com


Patch Notes
  • 2016-05-08 - TODAY WE ARE ROLLING OUT A NEW BUILD FOR YOU ALL TO ENJOY. WE TOOK A LOOK AT SEVERAL OUTSTANDING ISSUES IN REGARDS TO BEING ABLE TO REPLAY THE GAME, AND ITEMS THAT WOULD CAUSE THE GAME TO FREEZE.
